SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConnectionProvider
Returns a database connection.
DatabaseUtils
Several utilities for the work with databases that will be accessed through plain JDBC.
DatabaseUtils.ExecStatus
Instances of this class are used to return the status of a call to DatabaseUtils.execute(Connection,String...).
EnhancedPreparedStatement
The definition of an enhanced PreparedStatement.
EnhancedPreparedStatement.StatementLogger
The definition of logger method for a PreparedStatement.
EnhancedPreparedStatementBase
The base class for implementations of EnhancedPreparedStatement.
EnhancedPreparedStatementImpl
The implementation for EnhancedPreparedStatement.
ParameterMetaData
An instance of an implementation of this interface can be used to get information about the types and properties for each named parameter in an EnhancedPreparedStatement instance.
ParameterMetaDataBase
The base class for a variant of ParameterMetaData that is used by EnhancedPreparedStatement.
ResultSetSpliterator
An implementation of Spliterator for instances of ResultSet.
ResultSetWrapper
A wrapper for a result set that restricts the call to some methods.
SimpleConnectionProvider
An implementation of ConnectionProvider that will just call DriverManager.getConnection(String,Properties) to obtain a Connection.
StatementValue
A value for an EnhancedPreparedStatement.
StatementVariable
A variable for an EnhancedPreparedStatement.
StaticConnectionProvider
An implementation of ConnectionProvider that returns always the same Connection instance.
UniquenessViolationException
This exception will be thrown in cases where it is expected that a SELECT statement should return not more than one single record, but the ResultSet holds two or more records.
